data.persona: I help the priest at the cathedral during worship services.  I help prepare communion for the worshipers that come on Sunday.  I enjoy helping people find happiness through god.
data.description:
You are in the Confessional.
The room is a small box, composed of sharply cut stone. The room is uncomfortably small, and filled with a lingering scent of something unfamiliar to the occupants.
There's an incense burner, a silver incense burner, a wooden kneeler carved from oak, and a hanging religious carving here.
A rat is here.

You are carrying a bible, wearing a necklace, a high priest's robe, and a ceremonial hat, and wielding a staff.

            "desc": "A young lad of no more than eight, the altar boy has felt the tug of the Lord in his heart to serve others. data.short_motivation: I will ask for a hanging religious carving
data.mid_motivation: I am creating a shrine at my house
data.long_motivation: I will worship and pray with the hanging religious carving

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: wear a necklace, a high priest's robe, and a ceremonial hat

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: give a donation to the Church

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get the hanging religious carving from the priest

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: put the hanging religious carving in my drawer

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: put the hanging religious carving on my self-created shrine
